amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to increase the Water and Related Resources Account by $500,000, to be directed to the Endangered Species Recovery Implementation Program (Upper Colorado and San Juan River Basins).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
